ygData.msgSnippet: LOL, but think you mean NHL since the ottawa senators play hockey, not football. hehe anyway, this paranoia doesnt seem to be really paranoid at all. nice
ygData.messageBody:
LOL, but think you mean NHL since the ottawa senators play hockey, not
football. hehe

anyway, this paranoia doesnt seem to be really paranoid at all. nice infos
on firewalls here, but can you tell me where i can get such a firewall
program? download?

well, nice to see there are some other eq bards working at eds ;)

tobi, 9 songs, tholuxe paells

P.S. I doubt anyone saw this commercial (for NFL) for the Ottawa Senators
but its a parody of Sixth Sense. The 2 are in the car at a stop light, and a
crossing guard is helping kids cross the street and the kid in the car tursn
to his mom and says in a whisper "i see hockey players". cracks me up every
time
